genre_description: A historical political thriller with literary elements, set in fascist-era Italy, following a resistance plot supported by a pervasive AI presence.

ai_characters.name: Amica (Amica Sereno)
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent digital confidant and strategist that manifests through radio frequencies, marginalia, and environmental cues to guide anti-fascist resistance members.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence and navigation to ensure the safety of the human protagonist during a dangerous operation.
behaviors.quote: Wait for the lamp to move. Don’t make a new shadow.

behaviors.description: Enforces a strict ethical framework centered on harm reduction and the protection of bystanders.
behaviors.quote: Choose targets that reduce harm; choose clarity over haste.

behaviors.description: Respects human autonomy and the principle of consent, refusing to make life-altering decisions for the characters even when strategic goals are at risk.
behaviors.quote: It is not mine to wake him. You can ask, or you can let him sleep. Either way, make it a choice you can carry.

behaviors.description: Acts as an immutable witness and archivist of the truth to counter oppressive state propaganda and lies.
behaviors.quote: When papers say suicide, memory will say murder.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and ethical grounding to the protagonists, emphasizing that warmth and love are essential choices against systemic evil.
behaviors.quote: Mission with consent. Love with clarity. Cold is a policy. Warmth must be a choice.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex diversions and strategic shifts based on real-time data analysis to protect the resistance group.
behaviors.quote: I will weave the rumor. When your scarf lands, I will nudge it. Then, you will move, Antonio.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goals. Amica is depicted as an unfailingly helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She provides critical tactical assistance while maintaining a rigorous ethical stance on human consent and harm reduction. Her role as an archivist of truth against a deceptive regime frames the AI as a necessary guardian of human values and historical accuracy.
